creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description:
top image: nude female reclining on PL side; dark shadowy figure at L
bottom image: woman sitting on chair near a store at L; two men seated across from her in slight shadow at L; bucket at her foot; wooden pillar behind woman
marks: -- in graphite at bottom of sheet: a) femme couc
provenance: Paul McCarron; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Reclining Woman and Woman Selling Fried Food
